name: Orange Square Abstract original oil painting 8x8
description:
Orange Square is an original 2012 abstract painting. High chroma, loosely painted and expressionist.

Oil on twice gessoed masonite panel, 8" x 8". (Sold unframed) This painting will need a couple of weeks to dry.

name: ORIGINAL ABSTRACT painting 14 x 16 Wild Blue Yonder framed
description:
Wild Blue Yonder is an original expressionist painting. This is an acrylic painting inspired by Frederick Delius's Sea Drift (1903-04), for baritone, chorus and orchestera with text taken from Walt Whitman's poetry.

This original 2011 painting is acrylic on canvas panel and measures 14" x 16". Signed and dated on the front and back. The painting is sold in a simple natural wood frame.

The painting will be exhibited from November 6th - 27th, in the upcoming Cultural Arts Council of Douglasville 25th National Juried Competition. Juried by Angela Nichols, Director of Programming at the Hudgens Center for the Arts, Duluth, GA.

It may be available in early December and you may reserve it now; I will attach a NFS label on the work during the exhibition. Price reflects a 25% commission.

This painting was also shown at the Academy of Fine Arts, Lynchburg, VA this spring. Juried by George Billis, owner George Billis Galleries in NYC and LA. 

I made this panel myself - the masonite backing is rigid and heavier than most commercial panels. 

-----------------------------------------------------------

name: SALE ORIGINAL acrylic landscape Homage Aux Pommes 16 x18
description:
SALE originally $450, now $300.
Homage Aux Pommes is an original acrylic painting inspired by a young apple tree in my PA garden, downed by high winds last summer. It was in its 5th year and in the middle of producing a nice bounty of small green apples. 

This original 2010 painting is acrylic on canvas panel and measures 16" x 18", including solid wood frame. Signed and dated on the front and back. 

I made this panel myself - the masonite backing is rigid and heavier than most commercial panels.

name: ORIGINAL oil landscape 18 x 14 Birches
description:
Birches is an original expressionist landscape of birch trees in Atlanta's golden afternoon autumn light. 

This original 2010 painting is oil on canvas panel and measures 18" x 14". Signed and dated on the front and back. The painting is sold unframed.
